results.update:
### Avant Garde II - Half Moon Bay Marina

We have been delayed due to weather.

Looking to depart now on June 1.

[Marine Traffic Link](https://www.marinetraffic.com/en/ais/details/ships/shipid:698996/mmsi:512002527/vessel:AVANT%20GARDE%20II)

[Raw Position Data - Github](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/carlp/boat-position/master/data.json)
results.author: Carl Pattie

results.update: Departed through Z Peir in Auckland.  On our way.
results.author: Carl

results.update:
Started out with big seas and a good breeze.

Getting along well with top speed of 9.9kts, but averaging around 8kts.

All got a little queasy to begin with.  But coming right now.

Awakening (Tom) still relatively close by.

Writing updates in these seas is like trying to code while riding a mechanical bull. My office chair stomach couldn’t handle it the first day.
results.author: Carl

results.update:
Just put down the first fishing line.

Wind has dropped off overnight. Seas are easing as well, so the sailing is more enjoyable.

All happy on-board.
results.author: Carl

results.update:
Motor sailing now as the wind has dropped.

Not enough wind to keep the sails out with the swell and roll of the boat.

Fishing line out the back, hoping for a big catch.
results.author: Carl

results.update:
No fish yet.

Enjoying some sunshine on deck.

Crew are watching a movie, or having a nap as we continue to motor sail along.
results.author: Carl

results.update:
It's getting warmer. :-) 

The fish have taken Queens Birthday off as well, not a single bite.

Just watched the sun go down.  Looking forward to the Admirals Lasagna for dinner tonight. 

Latitude -31.5369  
Longitude 175.389
results.author: Carl

results.update:
Just finishing my night watch.

No other vessels in sight.

Great view of the stars as we motor north. 

Latitude -30.6506  
Longitude 175.572
results.author: Carl

results.update:
Still got a swell although the water is smooth on top with very little wind.  Still under motor.

Fishing line is back out.  Not expecting to catch anything.  It would add to the excitement of the day if we did. 

Latitude -29.8717  
Longitude 175.564
results.author: Carl

results.update:
No wind. We continue to motor.

This has given time for repairs, charging electronics, and showers. :-)  Crew are all smelling fresh again.

Matt just getting through his second Harry Potter film.  Aiming to finish them all before getting back to NZ.  

Latitude -29.5319  
Longitude 175.554
results.author: Carl

results.update:
Still not sailing as the wind is directly on the nose.  Hoping it will be more suitable for sailing soon.

The little Perkins (engine) still wirring away.

Crew spent the afternoon napping and reading.  Now just preparing for the sun to go down, and the night watches to start.

James & Otto, no fish caught yet.   

Latitude -28.8922  
Longitude 175.6469
results.author: Carl

results.update:
Wind picked up overnight.  Had to reef the main sail multiple times during the night.  Took it down this morning, and been on just the storm jib all day.

Back on the mechanical bull ride.  Avant Garde II doing well getting through the swell and chop.  Forecast suggests it will ease and be at a more favourable direction tonight.

If you thought writing code on a mechanical bull would be difficult, consider trying to use the restroom.

All well on board.

Latitude: -27.7422
Longitude: 177.0019
results.author: Carl

results.update:
Wind has eased and is now more westerly.  We are heading directly for Fiji now.  Still got a bit of a swell.

Matt back into Harry Potter today after wet Wednesday yesterday.

Crew all happy.

Latitude: -26.7856
Longitude: 177.388
results.author: Carl

results.update:
Great sailing today.
Still got a few bumps in the seas, but more bearable than yesterday. Nice and sunny out on deck.

Latitude: -25.9897
Longitude: 177.2803
results.author: Carl

results.update:
Wind went round to the south and dropped off overnight.  Motoring since midnight last night.

Matt back into Harry Potter as the seas are calmer.

Crew are just reading or working on getting a tan.

Latitude: -23.6764
Longitude: 177.5572
results.author: Carl
